objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Mystery/Detective lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about technology in daily life using formal register
Students create original mystery themed content about technology in daily life in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using formal register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in formal register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with clue
technology in daily life with investigation
technology in daily life with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
